name: The Mooz: A Story of betrayal
name_original: The Mooz: A Story of betrayal
description:
The Mooz : A Story of betrayal is in the world of medieval fantasy, where the ancestral spirit known as The Mooz lives. One day many strange events took place, people rebelling against the king. Letecia, Knight of the Realm, discovers that the king plotting to use the power of the Mooz to do bad things causing her to be accused of treason. 

Players will have adventures and quests to help the villagers and the rebels. To release the Mooz that was used by the King’s powers. Fight enemies born of ancient powers and armies from evil kings. 

Developers

We are Thai developers, This game is currently being developed by a group of students from Computer Game Multimedia Majors at Rangsit University.

Project Manager & Lead Programmer Werasil Rerkweang 

Level Designer Ponnipa Aiamchim

Art Director & 2D Artist Pattra Kongkitpisarn

3D Artist & Animator Apimuk Umnit

3D Modeler Kittipol Prepram

Special Thanks

Advisor Ekapong Nopawong

English Presenter Supitcha Chailom

Trailer Voice Over Artist Madison Lee
